apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji, as seen on Apple devices, beautifully portrays a couple with one person in a medium-light skin tone and the other in a medium skin tone, connected by a vibrant red heart. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading imbues the figures and the heart with a delightful dimensionality and realistic lighting, making them appear almost tangible. The soft rounded edges of the figures and the heart contribute to a feeling of tenderness and affection, making this emoji a perfect symbol of love, romance, and partnership in digital expressions on Apple devices.
